name: DigitisedArt
tag_list: art, cloud, inventory-management, galleries, collectors, dealers, fine-art
overview:
DigitisedArt is the premier solution for Art professionals to simply and securely manage, distribute and publish their collections.

Launched in 2011 with the aim of bringing the benefits of online inventory management to Galleries, Collectors, Artists and Art Fairs, DigitisedArt was developed after extensive consultations with the industry, and counts some of the world’s key art galleries and events amongst its clientele.

DigitisedArt is cloud based and device independent - art collections are securely held online and accessible from anywhere with an internet connection.

The system is scalable and secure, providing storage for high-resolution images, full biographical data, artwork history and translation support to cater for an international market.

DigitisedArt also taps the benefits of social networking, providing a unique connections feature allowing galleries to selectively and securely connect with clients or industry professionals to discreetly share artworks within their own custom private networks.

DigitisedArt’s real power lies in it’s ever-growing list of publishing channels, providing instant micro-sites for galleries and exhibitions through to synchronised websites and mobile apps through it’s API.
